statements: DELETE FROM LegalPrecedents WHERE jurisdiction = 'Supreme Court' AND judge_name = 'Justice Smith';
DELETE FROM LegalPrecedents WHERE jurisdiction = 'Supreme Court' AND case_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM judges WHERE court = 'Supreme Court' AND years_on_bench < 5;
DELETE FROM legal_precedents WHERE id = 5 AND court = 'Supreme Court';
DELETE FROM judges WHERE court = 'District Court' AND years_on_bench < 10;
DELETE FROM legal_precedents WHERE judge_name = 'Judge Smith';
DELETE FROM case_parties WHERE party_name = 'John Doe';
